entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow or ice pellets late in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning.
